channel.title: fun on Visible Data
channel.description: Recent content in fun on Visible Data

item.title: Using ggmap after July 2018
item.description: ggmap is an awesome package for creating maps with ggplot2. If you’ve seen a nice looking map built with ggplot2 I can almost guarantee you that it uses ggmap to look that good. The ggmap package is used to obtain base maps from the APIs of a number of online mapping tools, the one we care about here is the base maps from Google Maps (because they’re very good).

item.title: Christmas Drinks ggplot2 Advent Calendar 2018
item.description: Citable Author Martin John Hadley (orcid.org/0000-0002-3039-6849) Citable Data doi:10.6084/m9.figshare.7376228 Citable Code .Rmd on GitHub This Christmas it suddently hit me. There are probably enough festive coffees at Starbucks etc that you could use them to populate a very tasty advent calendar. In the interests of helping everyone explore the range of Christmassy drinks on offer, I’ll be updating my deposit 24 days of Christmass drinks on Figshare every year from now on.
